Install
================================
To install PyEquion using pip, you can

```sh
pip install pyequion2
```

You can also install from the sourse itself, from

https://github.com/pyequion/pyequion2.

Requires: \
numpy \
auto_mix_prep \
cloudpickle \
commentjson \
Cython \
matplotlib \
ordered_set \
periodictable \
PyQt5 \
scipy \
